title: Plan to keep Solo Ranked players in Bronze
body:
RIOT this HAS TO STOP!! time and time again THIS is what i get 

During Promo
7/4/1 - Me
0/5/1 - Supp
2/6/1 - Adc
1/9/1 - Mid
1/11/3 - Top

Regular Ranked
4/2/12 - Me
8/2/8 Top
4/2/25 - Supp
8/0/15 - Adc
19/3/8 - Mid

STOP GIVING ME GREAT TEAMS TO GET TO PROMO AND WHEN I GET TO PROMO YOU GIVE ME ABSOLUTELY BOTTOM OF THE BARREL TEAMS, at LEAST make it EVEN
